Component.Name: MessengerIOServer
Component.Description: Transports property and signal values between applications.

Signal.Name: outputDisabled
Signal.Description: [Disabled] Set to true when output is disabled.

Signal.Name: Send-Receive Roundtrip time
Signal.Description: [Disabled] Time to send and receive IOServer packets.

Signal.Name: NumberOfNodes
Signal.Description: [Disabled] Number of nodes defined in IOServer file.
If implemented by spesific IOServer the signal can be set true to disable output.
Signal.Name: OutputDisable

Parameter.Name: SignalTimeout
Parameter.Description: Timeout-delay used for the timer SignalTimeoutTimer.

Timer.Name: SignalTimeoutTimer
Timer.Description: Timer used to delay setting Transmission Error alarm. Timeout-delay is configured in Parameter SignalTimeout.
